original_title: Hace Mucho Quería Decirte Que Te Amo
overview: Joaquín is in love with his lifelong best friend, Lucía, and he does not dare to confess it.  In addition, Joaquín suffers from narcolepsy and an untimely change in medication, they play a bad  past after not knowing what the limit is between what you dream of and what really happens.
title: Hace Mucho Quería Decirte Que Te Amo
